name: furnace production, logs, 30kW | furnace, logs, 30kW | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/4911/documentation

This dataset represent the production and the disposal of a wood burning furnace for domestic heating system.

From reception of furnace components at the factory gate

This activity ends with the disposal of the device in the end of its lifetime. The dataset includes the most important materials used for the fabrication of the furnace, the accumulator hot water tank and the chimney flue pipes: steel, refractory bricks, electronic components, rock wool, polystyrene, plastics, lubricating oil, paint. The dataset includes also the concrete basement for the furnace (about 4m2), the land transformation and occupation and the energy and heat for the construction and the disposal of the device. The dataset doesn"t include the storage silo for logs (the furnace is assumed to be feeded manually with log wood). The dataset doesnt includes emissions from manufacture.
category: C:Manufacturing/28:Manufacture of machinery and equipment n.e.c./281:Manufacture of general-purpose machinery/2815:Manufacture of ovens, furnaces and furnace burners

processDocumentation.timeDescription: This model of furnace is commercialized since 2010 in Europe and Switzerland and is still available on the market (end 2011)
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Could be used for Central European conditions
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Boiler of modern technology available on the European and Swiss market. The model of reference is a log wood boiler, brand ETA/BUDERUS, model SH/Logano 30kW. Austrian technology, commericialized and manufactured also in Switzerland.;Source of the image: http://www.eta.co.at/109.0.html
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: literature, furnace manual available for customers, personal communication from producer and technician, measured data during wood boiler exposition
